name: Battleship Brick Breaker
description:
A battleship themed, 2-Player party game which uses brick breaker mechanics to create a competitive 1V1, arena experience. Compete against your opponent in a race to destroy the wooden bricks! Engage with handicap mechanics to gain the edge over your adversaries. 

Game is a work in progress. Should be available on the play store in future. Please feel free to share any feedback you may have,
